content.rendered:
Two days after version 0.9.4 went live on WordPress.org we are releasing a small update. Piklist 0.9.4.1 addresses the ONE valid issue we received from the community (if you don’t include us naming the language files incorrectly).

We worked hard to make sure the latest version of Piklist was the most stable and secure version ever, and it looks like the community agrees.

You can view the entire changelog at WordPress.org >
